name: Shane Hardman
text: do not recommend Industrial Cleaning Products, 629 Banks St, Glencoe, AL 35905 for repairs. I dropped off my lawn mower and was told it would be a week, maybe less to fix. A week and a day later I call and they have not even looked at the mower because the misplaced my paperwork. So two weeks and a day later I have to call again. The lady that answers the phone says that David will have to call me back. Finally receive a call back from the same lady to tell me that the mower is ready. You would think that they would at least knock some off the price after jerking me around...but nope. I will never do business with them again. Anybody know a GOOD small engine repair shop?

name: Danny Hancock
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful, knows his business .

name: Six “BLACKMQQN” Million
text: Over the road driver: Made a delivery to this location. I encountered about 5 employees. These were some of the nicest folks you could meet.

name: one neverwere
text: Top notch one on one customer service and excellent selection with multiple brands of each type of product to choose from.

name: Lance G
text: Wade and Brett always take care of me. They usually have everything in stock, and if they don't, they make sure I get what i need fast. Cannot recommend enough for pest needs.
